name: Bounce (itch) (RetrobitCoder)
description:
Multiplayer Arduboy game where both players play as a dog hitting a ball back and forth trying to prevent the ball from passing them.

Download files require an Arduboy or device that can play Arduboy games.

The game can also be played in broswer. You will want to click build and then the step(F7) arrow.

More info about the game can be found here.

This game can also be played by downloading Felipe Manga's Arduboy Emulator and dragging and dropping in the hex file.

Banner art created by LENZ.

Like what I make. Consider donating to help me keep making games.
